main event: A witness reported seeing a silver-white dull flying object approximately 25 feet in diameter in Worthington, Pennsylvania on May 15, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10-15 minutes as it moved slowly to the south., The witness described the object as definitely a flying object and not something unreliable., The sighting occurred during clear weather conditions., The witness had a significant amount of flying experience, enabling them to identify aerial objects., The report references another sighting that occurred two years prior.
witness description: The witness has over 20 years of experience flying airplanes.
